InstructionData.Title: Advanced Furnace Control
InstructionData.Description: Manual control of Advanced Furnace within a room.â€‹
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias furnace d0 alias outputDial d1 alias outputDisplay d2 alias inputDial d3 alias inputDisplay d4 alias countDisplay d5
alias inputSetting r0 alias outputSetting r1 alias reagentsCount r2
main: jal getReadings jal printInfo jal manageSettings j main
getReadings: l inputSetting inputDial Setting l outputSetting outputDial Setting l reagentsCount furnace Reagents j ra
printInfo: s inputDisplay Setting inputSetting s outputDisplay Setting outputSetting s countDisplay Setting reagentsCount j ra
manageSettings: s furnace SettingInput inputSetting s furnace SettingOutput outputSetting j ra
